Name: Hot And Lovely 5
About the game: A very interesting puzzle game. You need to remember different pictures by flipping the cards and find the same picture to eliminate. Players can view numbers by clicking on cards in the game. When two cards of the same number are opened at the same time, the cards are eliminated. When the player eliminates all cards, the level will be successfully cleared. Game Features: cute funny girls The game contains a total of 12 levels Various game mechanics 12 exquisite CGs A variety of interactive gameplay One-click skip Thank you all for your support of Lovely Games Studio.
